Name: [Hollow] Piggy bank
Desc: The more Gear Coins you owe, <color=#2BAD00>the higher the rebate</color> you receive when purchasing items at the Bangboo merchant. (Current Debt: {CReplaceCardParam:debt_1001001,1,2}. Current Rebate: {CReplaceCardParam:InterestRate_Card1001001,1,2}%.)
Desc2: A lovely looking piggy bank. It can bring the owner good luck. The catch is, if you want to get money out, you are going to have to break it.
